You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you find yourself in a large bedroom in a farmhouse. You see a young carefree girl resting on the bed, looking thoughtful. She smiles and licks her lips hungrily. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
